<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/sites"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This function returns a promise that resolves to an array of IGraphSite objects by calling the
sites method on the openGraphClient.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[]}

</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

</RequestSchema>
